title: How to Get a Sagittarius Woman to Chase You

steps.title: Sagittarius

Opt for compliments that feel specific to her, like her hilarious sense of humor, her unparalleled knack for adventure, or her chic, fashion-forward style. She'll end up chasing after you in hopes of getting more compliments. You might say something like, "I love hearing about all the places you've traveled. You're such an amazing storyteller" or "You're seriously one of the funniest people I've ever met." steps.title: Sagittarius women love to laugh with their romantic interests.
steps.content: Sagittarius women love to laugh with their romantic interests. Try texting her funny GIFS, DMing her memes you think she'd like, and even poking fun at yourself sometimes. She'll love your carefree, humorous nature and will be drawn to spend more time with you. It's okay if you don't think you're super funny. Another way to make a Sagittarius laugh is blunt, observational humor. Express your thoughts honestly and freely and she'll likely crack up. Remember to laugh at her jokes and smile when she's being silly, too. She wants to be with someone that appreciates her sense of humor.

steps.title: A Sagittarius woman enjoys the chase.
steps.content: A Sagittarius woman enjoys the chase. To really intrigue her, make her work to get to know you. Reveal only a few details about yourself at a time, don't always be available to text or make plans, and end the text conversation first sometimes. She'll like the fact that you're not completely available to her and will start chasing after you so she can learn more about you. Say something like, "I listen to all kinds of things. Indie rock is probably my favorite." Opt to end the conversation on a high note. After you've been texting for a while, say something like, "I'd love to keep chatting, but I've got to catch a movie. steps.content: Hold her interest with this kind and unexpected gesture. steps.title: Engage in interesting and thought-provoking conversations with her.
steps.content: Engage in interesting and thought-provoking conversations with her. Bring up subjects like literature, philosophy, history, and humanitarian causes. These subjects really matter to Sagittarius women. If you show her that you value them, too, she'll long to keep talking to you. [10] X Research source Opt for dates that stimulate interesting conversations, like checking out a museum or a bookstore. That way, you can ask questions like, "How did you feel about that exhibit?" or "What kind of stuff do you like to read?" Text her articles on humanitarian causes and political issues. Add something like, "I'd love to hear what you think about this." Approach your conversations with an open mind and a positive perspective. The sign of Sagittarius is ruled by Jupiter, which makes people born under this sign particularly positive, hopeful, and open to new ideas. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Sagittarius women like to do their own thing.
steps.content: Sagittarius women like to do their own thing. [12] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Try not to devote all of your energy and time to your Sagittarius crush. Stay focused on your career, keep up with your interests and hobbies, and spend plenty of time with your friends and family. Living your own separate life will really draw her in, and she'll end up seeing you as a like-minded, fiercely independent soul. She'll probably end up missing you when you're gone, too. [13] X Research source A Sagittarius is usually pretty comfortable being alone. Show her that you're similar by taking a solo trip or spending a few hours reading by yourself at a coffee shop. Avoid getting jealous or territorial of your Sagittarius crush. Making her feel pinned down may send her running in the opposite direction. [14] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. She'll want you more if you're happy to share her with her many friends and acquaintances!

steps.content: A Sagittarius is drawn to someone who is worldly and spontaneous. [15] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. A Sagittarius woman is always looking for new things to try. If she sees that you take a similar approach to life, she'll want to come along on your adventures. Check out new restaurants and bars in your area instead of going to your usual spots. If there's not a ton of places to choose from, order something new off the menu at your favorite restaurant. If your Sagittarius crush follows you on social media, try posting pictures of your adventures. Share a beautiful view from a new hiking trail or a fun photo you took in a dive bar photo booth.

steps.title: A Sagittarius woman wants someone who is as blunt as she is.
steps.content: A Sagittarius woman wants someone who is as blunt as she is. As you get to know her, communicate openly and directly. Your like-minded approach to communication will only leave her wanting you more, and she'll appreciate that you don't play games with her heart. [17] X Research source Be honest about what you're looking for instead of playing games. If you've been hanging out for a while, say something like, "I really like you. I'd love to keep seeing you." She'll be super attracted to your direct approach. Don't be afraid to disagree with her anytime you get into an interesting discussion. You might say, "That's a super interesting point. I had a kind of different take on it." If conflicts ever arise between the two of you, approach the situation respectfully and talk about it. Sagittarius women aren't into passive aggression, and they'll likely be happy to work things out.
